爱,ài,love,Learnt,我很爱你，你爱我吗？,"Wǒ hěn ài nǐ, nǐ ài wǒ ma?","I love you very much, do you love me?",ai.mp3

很,hěn,"quite, very",Learnt,我很喜欢他。,Wǒ hěn xǐhuān tā.,I really like him.,hen.mp3

几,jǐ,"a few, how many",,你买了几本书?,Nǐ mǎile jǐ běn shū?,How many books did you buy?,ji.mp3
家,jiā,home,,我的家有三个人，爸爸，妈妈和我。,"Wǒ de jiā yǒusān gèrén, bàba, māmā hé wǒ.","There are three people in my family, father, mother and me.",jia.mp3
